title: Shakshuka
description: Tomato-pepper skillet with poached eggs, classic Israeli breakfast.
instructions: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat; sauté onion and pepper until soft.
Add garlic; cook 30 seconds until fragrant.
Stir in tomato paste, crushed tomatoes, paprika, cumin, salt, and pepper.
Simmer 10 minutes until slightly thickened.
Make 4 wells and crack in eggs; cover and cook until whites set.
Garnish with parsley and serve warm.

title: Classic Pancakes
description: Fluffy, quick pancakes perfect for weekend breakfasts.
instructions: Whisk dry ingredients in a bowl.
Whisk milk, egg, butter, and vanilla in another bowl.
Combine wet and dry; mix just until incorporated.
Cook 1/4-cup portions on a hot griddle until bubbles form; flip and finish.
Serve with maple syrup.

title: Chicken Stir-Fry
description: Weeknight chicken with crisp veggies and a savory sauce.
ingredients: 3 cups mixed vegetables (broccoli, bell pepper, carrot)
instructions: Toss chicken with soy sauce and cornstarch; set aside 10 minutes.
Heat oil in a wok; stir-fry chicken until almost cooked; remove.
Stir-fry vegetables until tender-crisp.
Return chicken; add garlic, ginger, and sesame oil; toss 1–2 minutes.
Top with green onions; serve over rice.

title: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: Rich meat sauce simmered with tomatoes and aromatics.
instructions: Cook spaghetti per package directions; reserve 1/2 cup pasta water.
Sauté onion, carrot, celery in oil until soft; add garlic.
Brown beef; drain excess fat.
Stir in tomato paste, crushed tomatoes, and wine; season.
Simmer 25–30 minutes; loosen with pasta water if needed.
Toss with spaghetti; garnish with basil.

title: Vegan Buddha Bowl
description: Colorful bowl with quinoa, roasted chickpeas, and tahini-lemon sauce.
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package.
Roast chickpeas and sweet potato with oil, salt, and pepper at 200°C for 20–25 minutes.
Whisk tahini with lemon juice and a splash of water to thin; season.
Assemble bowls: quinoa, veggies, avocado.
Drizzle tahini sauce and serve.

title: Homemade Sushi Rolls
description: Rice-vinegar seasoned sushi rice rolled with nori and fresh fillings.
instructions: Cook sushi rice; season with vinegar, sugar, and salt; cool slightly.
Place nori on a mat; spread rice in a thin layer.
Arrange fillings along the edge.
Roll tightly using the mat.
Slice with a sharp wet knife.
Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and ginger.
